name: DataGridConfigurationStrategy
description: Interface for strategy services implementing storage of data-grid configuration data.
rawdescription: Interface for strategy services implementing storage of data-grid configuration data.

methods.name: getConfig$
methods.rawdescription: A method to retrive configuration data.

jsdoctags.comment: Any data needed for the configuration data to be uniquely identified and retrieved.

methods.name: getContext
methods.rawdescription: Allows to retrieve the context provided for the given configuration strategy.
methods.description: Allows to retrieve the context provided for the given configuration strategy.

methods.name: isContextKnown
methods.rawdescription: Tells if strategy has been already provided with context or context provider.
methods.description: Tells if strategy has been already provided with context or context provider.

methods.name: saveConfig$
methods.rawdescription: A method to persist configuration data.
